page.title: 05TOURISM
page.content: {Tourism}is an important source of revenue to the people of {Biggar}as many people are attracted to the town by its Museums and sites.The other main attraction is that the layout of Biggar has changed little since the last century. Then of course there is the nice scenery. Of these attractions the Historical ones probably rate the highest. The {Biggar Museum Trust }has several places open to the public , the Gladstone Court Folk Museum and a reconstructed seventeenth century house,which has links with the Covenanting times. There are other sights like the {Biggar Gas {Works,}the Cadger's Brig connected with William Wallace and the old medieval {Church} of St Marys. Also some visitors are attracted by the charm of the old worldly hotels such as the eighteenth century Elpinstone.
